Title: SharePoint Client Object Model Uploader
Description:
Any user who works with SharePoint Platform usually upload documents to Document Library using normal UI page therefore
The user need to be authenticated and part of domain user in same environment. 
So, What about Non-domain user?
Here is the solution by use SharePoint Client Object Model.

SharePoint Development technology has the ability to do such action using Client Object Model)

This project simply is for uploading multi documents to SharePoint 2010 site using default authentication or different credentials(for none domain users).
Using Client Object Model technology,

On this project the uploading is through Windows Form (Client Object Model) and it has the following advantages 

•	Control the size of uploaded files.
•	Set the Files types.
•	Use Streaming for uploaded instead of Http post request.
•	Enable Logging for upload actions.
•	Control the upload time on the server.
•	Allow out of domain users to upload .

I hope this project to developed and be more advanced for you 

Best Regards,
Megren Al-Shaieq
www.megren.net
